short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding legal information to EUR-Lex, Riigi Teataja, Riigikohus.ee, Likumi.lv

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
xLaw - knowledge management platform for Lawyers.

Adds extra information to EUR-Lex, Riigiteataja.ee, Riigikohus.ee, Likumi.lv, Curia (court cases, journal articles, redaction comparison etc)

xLaw Estonia: explanatory memorandums, translations, court cases, journal articles, private comments etc.
xLaw Latvia: english translations, redaction comparisons, court case search engine.
xLaw EU: private comments, court cases with 1-click etc.
xLaw Quicksearch: navigation to different sources (legislation, cases, business registry etc).

More information: extendlaw.com ja xlaw@extendlaw.com
